content: this warm winter set is a simple slouchy double-sided beanie in stockinette stitch and a cowl in brioche stitch i posted photo of this set i made for myself in one of the fb knitting groups and got a lot of requests to make a pattern this is the first pattern i ever written so please do not hesitate to contact me for any questions if you find a mistake or else the pattern calls for drops air yarn you need around 4 5 skeins for the set or about 2 skeins for the hat only
